meanings.definition: A person or animal that bites.
meanings.sent1: The dog was known to be one of the biters in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: Watch out for those biters in the wild!
meanings.sent3: The biters at the zoo always get excited during feeding time.
meanings.sent4: The biters in the movie were so realistic, they made everyone jump.
meanings.sent5: The biters in the story were described as fierce and dangerous.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used for cutting or gripping.
meanings.sent1: The scissors were the best biters for cutting paper.
meanings.sent2: The pliers are great biters for holding onto things.
meanings.sent3: The biters in the toolbox always come in handy for various tasks.
meanings.sent4: The biters on the machine worked efficiently to cut through the metal.
meanings.sent5: The biters on the tool were sharp and precise in their cutting.

meanings.sent1: The fisherman used a colorful biter to attract the fish.
meanings.sent2: The biter floated on the water, enticing the fish to bite.
meanings.sent3: The biter wiggled in the water, fooling the fish into thinking it was real.
meanings.sent4: The biter danced on the surface, tempting the fish to strike.
meanings.sent5: The biter shimmered in the sunlight, drawing the fish closer.
